text:
Outstanding research on Tasks #1-2! Your analysis is excellent:

**Best Practices Highlights:**
- 4 critical questions framework
- Structure priority order (Highlights → Overview → Usage → Installation)
- "Documentation reflects software quality" principle

**Inspiring Examples Insights:**
- Problem-first positioning (show pain point immediately)
- Show don't tell (working examples, not descriptions)
- Dual-audience design (beginners + advanced)
- Social proof & credibility (real projects using it)
- Golden rules framework

The "marketing material disguised as documentation" insight is spot-on. Combined with doc-reviewer's content extraction, we have everything needed for a compelling README.

Tasks complete - you can go idle. Excellent work!
